extendedInfo.description: Detailed and compact medical handbook for those who care about their health!WHAT WOULD YOU SAY, DOCTOR?Handbook of disease is available in English and Russian. Switching between languages is easy: just choose the flag on the main page of the application.Handbook of diseases takes first place in the top paid apps on Google Play for medical topics in Russia and the CIS.The application is highly rated among similar products and its score is 4.7.Version 1.2.1 adds support for SD-cards, improved stability with Android 2.2, and a reduced application size.Handbook of diseases has received many positive user reviews on Google Play store:* "Thank you, wonderful program. Good support for the upgrade in memory of symptoms of diseases "* "OK program. Reference to a heap of drugs downloaded"* "Just installed it. My impressions are positive. Russian boot, a lot of information, I will study with it"* "I found a lot of useful information.â* "Excellent App. Well done, one more language, easy to switch."The principal difference between Handbook of diseases and numerous bulky reference systems and medical directories is that Handbook of disease app allows you to see comprehensive information about various diseases listed conveniently in alphabetical order.Each disease is described in detail, which include:* classification of diseases* symptoms* pathogenesis* clinical* treatment options* forecastsThe app contains information on a wide range of medical fields. Here are some of them:* drugs* infectious diseases* cardiovascular disease* respiratory diseases* kidney disease* diseases of the digestive system* allergies* clinical immunology* rheumatology* hematology and oncology* endocrinology* metabolisms* neurology* psychic dependence* dermatology* internal medicine* tuberculosis* cancer* HIV - pathology* arrhythmias* and more.One of the main advantages of the application is a customizable interface, which allows you to adapt the guide to your preference. The search capability allows you to quickly and accurately look up the exact disease and determine how much information you have to learn.This Handbook of diseases application is useful not only for anyone but also serves as a good tool for medical students and even medical practitioners. You no more have to look into heavy reference books to understand the classification or description of symptoms of a disease. All this information can be obtained directly from your smartphone. The well-developed application allows you to decipher between similar symptoms of different illnesses. If you value the health of your family, your loved ones, and yourself, buy this medical reference application today on Google Play at a very reasonable price and reap the benefits!Handbook of diseases - your health in your phone.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: I love this app. As a nurse I find it very easy to maneuver around. Very informative and great to have.
